alert.note: Alert for Central and Southeast Howard; Central and Southeast Montgomery; Northwest Howard; Northwest Montgomery (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 7:02PM EST until January 06 at 2:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 2 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of a coating to an inch and ice accumulations of a glaze to one- tenth of an inch. * WHERE...In Maryland, Northwest Montgomery, Central and Southeast Montgomery, Northwest Howard and Central and Southeast Howard Counties. In Virginia, Southern Fauquier County. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 2 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Precipitation is expected to begin as a mix of snow, sleet, and freezing rain between 7 and 10 AM, before gradually changing over to rain during the late morning to early afternoon hours. The rain will come to an end during the evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

area.areaDesc: Central and Southeast Howard; Central and Southeast Montgomery; Northwest Howard; Northwest Montgomery
